SEARCH
Package com.comp2042.model

Interface Board

All Known Implementing Classes:
SimpleBoard
public interface Board
Interface defining the core operations of a Tetris game board. It handles brick movement, rotation, locking, and row clearing.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    ClearRow
    clearRows()
    Checks for and clears any completed rows in the board.
    boolean
    createNewBrick()
    Spawns a new brick at the top of the board.
    int[][]
    getBoardMatrix()
    Gets the current state of the board as a 2D integer array.
    Score
    getScore()
    Gets the score object associated with the board.
    ViewData
    getViewData()
    Gets the view data for the current brick, including its position, shape, and shadow.
    void
    hardDrop()
    Instantly drops the current brick to the lowest possible position.
    void
    mergeBrickToBackground()
    Merges the current falling brick into the board's static background matrix.
    boolean
    moveBrickDown()
    Attempts to move the current brick down by one row.
    boolean

    Attempts to move the current brick one column to the left.

    Attempts to move the current brick one column to the right.

    newGame()
    Resets the board for a new game.
    boolean
    rotateLeftBrick()
    Attempts to rotate the current brick to the left (counter-clockwise).

  • Method Details

    • moveBrickDown

      boolean moveBrickDown()
      Attempts to move the current brick down by one row.
      Returns:
      True if the move was successful, false if it was blocked.

    • hardDrop

      void hardDrop()
      Instantly drops the current brick to the lowest possible position.

    • moveBrickLeft

      boolean moveBrickLeft()
      Attempts to move the current brick one column to the left.
      Returns:
      True if the move was successful, false if it was blocked.

    • moveBrickRight

      boolean moveBrickRight()
      Attempts to move the current brick one column to the right.
      Returns:
      True if the move was successful, false if it was blocked.

    • rotateLeftBrick

      boolean rotateLeftBrick()
      Attempts to rotate the current brick to the left (counter-clockwise).
      Returns:
      True if the rotation was successful, false if it was blocked.

    • createNewBrick

      boolean createNewBrick()
      Spawns a new brick at the top of the board.
      Returns:
      True if the new brick can be placed, false if it collides immediately (Game Over).

    • getBoardMatrix

      int[][] getBoardMatrix()
      Gets the current state of the board as a 2D integer array.
      Returns:
      The board matrix where values represent block colors.

    • getViewData

      ViewData getViewData()
      Gets the view data for the current brick, including its position, shape, and shadow.
      Returns:
      The ViewData object containing brick render information.

    • mergeBrickToBackground

      void mergeBrickToBackground()
      Merges the current falling brick into the board's static background matrix. This is called when a brick locks into place.

    • clearRows

      ClearRow clearRows()
      Checks for and clears any completed rows in the board.
      Returns:
      A ClearRow object containing information about cleared lines and the new board state.

    • getScore

      Score getScore()
      Gets the score object associated with the board.
      Returns:
      The Score object.

    • newGame

      void newGame()
      Resets the board for a new game. Clears the matrix and resets the score.
